dc:title: On Pilgrimage - September 1957
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Notes visitors from South Africa and her jailing for civil disobedience. Graphic account of her grandchildren at play and "the causalities of life with children. Ah me!"
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 727 1957-09-02 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
